step_feedback.feedback: Good job keeping your arms in front of your chest and tightening your muscles. Ensure your fists are closed tightly.
You're opening your fingers and extending your arms well. Try to relax your muscles more as you exhale and extend.
Excellent work on the outward arm movement and muscle relaxation. Keep your fingers open wide.
Good job extending your arms to shoulder height. Focus on a smooth exhale as you relax your muscles.
You're doing great with the outward movement. Ensure you're fully relaxing your muscles as you exhale.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fists tight when bringing your arms in and fully relax your muscles as you extend them outwards. Continue practicing these movements.
